name: Aligeon
description:
You start at age 5, every time you enter a new room, you age up a bit. If you hit 80 years old, it is game over!
Use your superior abilities to take down all of the enemies on your way to fulfill a full life, and have as much money as possible! Controls WASD/Arrow keys - Movement Mouse - Aim Left Click - Fire left weapon Right Click - Fire right weapon E - interact Credits Font - Sizenko Alexander | Style-7 | http://www.styleseven.com Literally everything else - Ya'akov Goldberg | http://www.yaakovg.com

Github Source Code
